name: Shattered Life
description:
Adventure/Puzzle game where the player plays as a person that suffers from Alzheimer's trying to remember his life in a spatial puzzle.

Re-organize the rooms through the inventory in order to reach the desired pre-defined rooms in the house assigned in the map.

This was a university project. Please excuse some bugs you might encounter, but please, feel free to leave a comment telling us what you think! 

Controls:

Move - 'WASD'

Look around - Mouse

Interact - 'E'

Open Inventory - 'Tab'

Move objects in inventory - Click and drag
